About

I am a Ph.D. student in theoretical computer science at UC Irvine. My advisor is Sandy Irani. My research interests include online algorithms and in particular caching.

Publications
    • Cache replacement with memory allocation
    • S Ghandeharizadeh, S Irani, J Lam, ALENEX 2015.
    • conference paper    presentation
    • CAMP: a cost adaptive multi-queue eviction policy for key-value stores
    • S Ghandeharizadeh, S Irani, J Lam, J Yap, Middleware 2014.
